extendedInfo.description: Good Bowler Stats Lite is a bowling score keeper/tracker. This app tracks the score ball for ball down to the pin for 1 - 4 games. Once you have entered scores you can view different stats including:AverageHigh GameHigh SeriesNumber of StrikesStrike %Most Strikes in a rowNumber of SparesSpare %Graphical Stats are for:Game scores by game in a line graphSeries Scores in a line graphNumber of Strikes, Spares, and Opens for a game bar chartSingle pin open/spare comparison by pin number bar chartYou can access the menu for help and to buy the paid version of the app. This version has advertisements and the paid version does not. You can try out this version and then upgrade to the paid version that has more features and is ad free. There is a link in the menu. You can also use the import/export feature to move your data from the free version to the paid versions.(Instructions are in the help section of the menu)Feel free to email me with comments and/or suggestions to improve this app.

reviews.title: Update wiped out games
reviews.comment: Latest updates wiped out all games in three leagues. That is stupid to update an app n not save current games entered. I did rate it 5 stars n now rate it 0 if it was possible. Don\'t buy.
reviews.author: Larry Welch

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: This app is great, you can track pin for pin action for multiple people and it gives statistical read outs for one pin spares and stricks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dates
reviews.comment: Have to punch in the dates. Like the graphs but inadequate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellet little app
reviews.comment: Of all the apps that I have tried for tracking my bowling scores, this one is by far the best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app.  Would be nice to have an open bowling for non-league bowling that has more than three games at a time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looked promising doesn\'t work for poop
reviews.comment: Wouldn\'t work at all on galaxy s3. Never gives the keyboard input screen for options.
reviews.author: A Google User
